name: The Looming Shadow
description:
This was a Lovecraft-inspired Visual Novel I wrote and coded for an Interactive Storytelling unit at Macquarie University. The in game music works for the itch browser embed, but I forget what nature of magick allows one to autoplay music in Chrome from files on a hard drive. Sorry.

Words by Ben Larkin

Code by Ben Larkin

Images by Ben Larkin (Sorry)

Music by Kevin Macleod
